entry.title: LaserPecker 2/3 Laser Protection Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: laserpecker.net
Type: Accessories
Price: 125.99

  • Safeguard Your Eyesight: The laser protective cover is specially designed for LaserPecker 2 & 3. It can effectively filter both laser types of LP2 & LP3, and provide the highest level of full protection for you and your companions.
  • Hall Sensor System: A built-in Hall sensor automatically pauses the project work, once the door is opened, and resumes the work when the door is closed. So you can work safely and showcase your engraving with a peace of mind.
  • Garantee A Healthy Workspace: With a built-in smoke exhaustion fan, the protective cover helps better extract the unpleasant smoke and smell generated during the laser engraving. Can also be used with LaserPecker Air Purifier for optimal results.
  • Built to Last: Made of high-quality acrylic material,solid and durable enough to provide long-lasting reliable protection.
  • Laser Filter Range: 190-550 nm (Violet / Blue Light), 800-1100nm (Infrared Light).
Dimensions:
  • Protective Cover: 287 x 263 x 257 mm / 11.30" x 10.35" x 10.11" (L x W x H)
  • Material: Acrylic, Plastic, Aluminium Alloy

entry.title: Preorder-LaserPecker LP4 Laser Protection Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: laserpecker.net
Type: Accessories
Price: 159.20

Expected Shipping Time: Mid-September 2023

Safeguard Your Eyesight: The laser protective cover is specially designed for LaserPecker 4. It can effectively filter both laser types of LP4 and provide the highest level of full protection for you and your companions.

Hall Sensor System: A built-in Hall sensor automatically pauses the project work, once the door is opened, and resumes the work when the door is closed. So you can work safely and showcase your engraving with a peace of mind.

Garantee A Healthy Workspace: With a built-in smoke exhaustion fan, the LP4 protective cover helps better extract the unpleasant smoke and smell generated during the laser engraving. Can also be used in excellent combination with LaserPecker Air Purifier for optimal results.

Built to Last: Made of high-quality acrylic material,solid and durable enough to provide long-lasting reliable protection.

Laser Filter Ranges:

190-550 nm (Violet / Blue Light)

800-1100 nm (Infrared Light)

Dimensions:

Protective Cover: 335 x 315 x 275 mm / 13.18" x 12.40" x 10.82" (L x W x H)

Risers: max. 125 mm / 4.92"

Material: Acrylic, Plastic, Aluminium Alloy

entry.title: LaserPecker LP4 Cutting Plate
entry.summary:
Vendor: laserpecker.net
Type: Accessories
Price: 25.59

Features:

Burn Protection: The cutting plate can be used to place the objects for engraving and cutting, thus prevent the bottom plate of the valuable electric stand from being scorched or contaminated during the engraving process.

Hollow Strips Design: The hollow design facilitates smoke ventilation beneath, protects the underside of the objects from turning yellow due to burning residue and improves your creation effectively.

Solid & Exquisite: Made of high-quality anodised aluminium alloy, combined with exquisite finish, firm and durable for long time service.

Material: Anodised Aluminium Alloy

Dimensions: 7.48 x 5.9 inch / 190 x 150 mm

Color: Dark blue (Same as the LP4)

entry.title: LaserPecker Bluetooth Dongle For LP2 & LP3 & LP4
entry.summary:
Vendor: LaserPecker
Type: Accessories
Price: 41.99

Laserpecker bluetooth usb dongle for PC is a small tool similar to a USB flash drive, with a length of 4cm, a width of 2cm and a height of 0.5cm. The material is anodized aluminum

Small and Easy to Carry: Laserpecker good bluetooth adapter for PC is small and light, easy to carry, you can hold it in your hand, put it in your pocket or purse

Easy to Operate: just plug into the USB port of the computer, open the app and use it, the operation is simple

Better Compatibility: our bluetooth dongle adapters for PC are compatible no matter you are windows or Mac system

Material: Aluminum alloy and Glass
Weight: 15.75g
Size: 54*22*10mm
Color: Gray
